item.title: Miami HC Mario Cristobal on Jimmy Johnson After CFP Win: 'He Changed Our Lives'
item.description: After Miami beat Ohio State in the Cotton Bowl, Mario Cristobal explained what former school head coach Jimmy Johnson means to him.

item.title: 'We Didn't Get It Done': Ryan Day Takes Blame for Ohio State CFP Loss to Miami
item.description: Ryan Day, who assumed offensive playcalling duties, took responsibility for Ohio State's Cotton Bowl loss to Miami.

item.title: Edwards leaves bench after Wolves pull starters
item.description: Anthony Edwards made an unplanned and unapproved exit Wednesday, leaving the court and the bench during a timeout late in Minnesota's loss at Atlanta.

item.title: Chelsea confirm Maresca exit amid poor PL run
item.description: Chelsea have confirmed they have parted ways with manager Enzo Maresca ahead of Sunday's game against Manchester City.

item.title: Manning's 60-yard TD run seals Horns' Citrus win
item.description: Texas quarterback Arch Manning wrapped up Citrus Bowl MVP honors with a 60-yard scoring run in a 41-27 victory over No. 14 Michigan.
